data.lyric:
[ti:The Champion]
[ar:Carrie Underwood/Ludacris]
[al:The Champion]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.22]The Champion (冠军) - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)/Ludacris (卢达·克里斯)
[00:00.99]Written by：Carrie Underwood/Brett James/Chris DeStefano/Chris Bridges
[00:02.33]
[00:07.62]Carrie Underwood：
[00:08.31]
[00:09.80]I'll be the last one standing
[00:11.78]Two hands in the air I'm a champion
[00:14.46]You'll be looking up at me when it's over
[00:17.06]I live for the battle I'm a soldier yeah
[00:20.39]I'm a fighter like Rocky
[00:22.25]Put your flag on your back like Ali
[00:24.72]
[00:25.67]Yeah I'm the greatest I'm stronger
[00:27.84]Paid my dues can't lose I'm own ya ay
[00:31.57]
[00:32.27]I've been working my whole life
[00:37.07]
[00:37.68]And now it's do or die
[00:41.53]I am invincible unbreakable
[00:44.75]Unstoppable unshakeable
[00:47.45]They knock me down I get up again
[00:49.88]
[00:51.06]I am the champion you're gon' know my name
[00:55.29]You can't hurt me now I can't feel the pain
[00:57.90]I was made for this yeah I was born to win
[01:00.47]
[01:01.56]I am the champion
[01:06.84]
[01:08.09]When they write my story
[01:09.79]They gonna say that I did it for the glory
[01:12.44]But don't think that I did it for the fame yeah
[01:15.06]I did it for the love of the game yeah
[01:18.02]And this is my chance I'm taking
[01:20.30]All them old records I'm breaking
[01:23.00]All you people watching on the TV
[01:25.64]You go ahead and put your bets on me ay
[01:29.52]
[01:30.28]I've been waiting my whole life
[01:35.60]To see my name in lights
[01:39.62]I am invincible unbreakable
[01:42.73]Unstoppable unshakeable
[01:45.45]They knock me down I get up again
[01:48.29]
[01:49.14]I am the champion you're gon' know my name
[01:53.38]You can't hurt me now I can't feel the pain
[01:55.98]I was made for this yeah I was born to win
[01:59.03]
[01:59.58]I am the champion oh
[02:08.05]
[02:09.83]Ludacris：
[02:10.11]Born champion Luda
[02:12.28]The C is for the courage I possess through the trauma
[02:14.94]H is for the hurt but it's all for the honor
[02:17.58]A is for my attitude working through the patience
[02:20.16]Money comes and goes so the M is for motivation
[02:22.96]Gotta stay consistent the P is for persevere
[02:25.32]The I is for integrity innovative career
[02:27.99]The O is optimistic open and never shut
[02:30.55]And the N is necessary 'cause I'm never givin' up
[02:33.17]See they ask me how I did it I just did it from the heart
[02:35.88]Crushin' the competition been doing it from the start
[02:38.46]They say that every champion is all about his principles
[02:41.24]Carrie
[02:41.65]Carrie Underwood：
[02:42.22]I am invincible unbreakable
[02:46.01]Unstoppable unshakeable
[02:48.72]They knock me down I get up again
[02:51.68]
[02:52.38]I am the champion you're gon' know my name
[02:56.63]You can't hurt me now I can't feel the pain
[02:59.18]I was made for this yeah I was born to win
[03:02.21]
[03:02.90]I am the champion
[03:05.25]
[03:06.92]Ludacris：
[03:07.18]I'm the champion yeah surpassed all rivals
[03:10.91]
[03:12.79]It's all about who wants it the most
[03:13.93]Carrie Underwood：
[03:14.28]I am the champion
[03:17.94]Ludacris：
[03:18.19]Fight for what we believe in
[03:19.47]
[03:21.19]That's what champions are made of
[03:22.78]Carrie Underwood：
[03:23.37]
[03:24.04]I am the
[03:25.48]Both：
[03:26.03]Champion
data.trans:
[ti:The Champion]
[ar:Carrie Underwood/Ludacris]
[al:The Champion]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.99]//
[00:02.33]
[00:07.62]//
[00:08.31]
[00:09.80]我会坚持到最后
[00:11.78]把双手挥舞向天空 我就是冠军
[00:14.46]当一切落幕 你会仰望着我的光芒
[00:17.06]我生来就是为了战斗 我是个英勇无畏的战士
[00:20.39]我就像洛基一样 是个天生的战士
[00:22.25]就像阿里那样 向我发起攻击吧
[00:24.72]
[00:25.67]因为我所向披靡 强壮有力
[00:27.84]我有仇必报 永不失败 我会征服你们所有人
[00:31.57]
[00:32.27]我会付出我的全部人生 去拼尽全力
[00:37.07]
[00:37.68]不是前进就是灭亡
[00:41.53]我天下无敌 坚不可摧
[00:44.75]永不止步 不可动摇
[00:47.45]即便被打倒在地 我也会再次崛起
[00:49.88]
[00:51.06]我是冠军 你会知道我的大名
[00:55.29]你无法伤害我 我根本感受不到疼痛
[00:57.90]天赋异禀 生来就是为了胜利
[01:00.47]
[01:01.56]我就是冠军
[01:06.84]
[01:08.09]当人们为我谱写赞歌
[01:09.79]他们会说 我所做的一切都是为了荣誉
[01:12.44]但是不要以为 我会为了虚名折腰
[01:15.06]我所做的一切 都只是因为我热爱这个游戏
[01:18.02]这是我要抓住的机会
[01:20.30]我会打破一切记录
[01:23.00]你们会在电视上看到我的胜利
[01:25.64]你就放心把赌注押在我的身上吧
[01:29.52]
[01:30.28]我用一生的时间等待
[01:35.60]看着我的名字熠熠生辉
[01:39.62]我天下无敌 坚不可摧
[01:42.73]永不止步 不可动摇
[01:45.45]即便被打倒在地 我也会再次崛起
[01:48.29]
[01:49.14]我是冠军 你会知道我的大名
[01:53.38]你无法伤害我 我根本感受不到疼痛
[01:55.98]天赋异禀 生来就是为了胜利
[01:59.03]
[01:59.58]我就是冠军
[02:08.05]
[02:09.83]//
[02:10.11]天生的冠军
[02:12.28]当我从伤痛中挣扎出来 C代表着无限的勇气
[02:14.94]H代表着伤痛 但是也代表着荣誉
[02:17.58]当我耐心等待着胜利 A代表着我的态度
[02:20.16]金钱只是身外之物而已 M代表着我会永远鼓舞着自己
[02:22.96]一直坚持着自我 P代表着永远不屈不挠
[02:25.32]I代表着我不断革新的职业生涯
[02:27.99]O代表着乐观的态度 永远敞开内心
[02:30.55]N代表着这是我的命中注定 因为我永不放弃
[02:33.17]你看 别人问我我是如何取得这样的成绩 这是因为我全心投入的结果
[02:35.88]从一开始就拼尽全力
[02:38.46]人们都说 冠军是制胜秘诀就是他坚强的内心
[02:41.24]//
[02:41.65]//
[02:42.22]我天下无敌 坚不可摧
[02:46.01]永不止步 不可动摇
[02:48.72]即便被打倒在地 我也会再次崛起
[02:51.68]
[02:52.38]我是冠军 你会知道我的大名
[02:56.63]你无法伤害我 我根本感受不到疼痛
[02:59.18]天赋异禀 生来就是为了胜利
[03:02.21]
[03:02.90]我就是冠军
[03:05.25]
[03:06.92]//
[03:07.18]我就是冠军 打败所有对手
[03:10.91]
[03:12.79]这是我渴望已久的胜利
[03:13.93]//
[03:14.28]我就是冠军
[03:17.94]//
[03:18.19]为了我们的信仰而战
[03:19.47]
[03:21.19]这就是冠军的特质
[03:22.78]//
[03:23.37]
[03:24.04]我就是
[03:25.48]//
[03:26.03]冠军
